Key Match Events: England successfully chase down 144 to win by 4 wickets with 2 balls remaining
Ben Stokes plays a crucial role in guiding England to victory with a nervy chase
Sri Lanka's middle order unravels after a strong start, with key players falling in crucial moments
Pre-Game Insights: England's bowlers showed crucial fightback in the middle overs to limit Sri Lanka's total
The SCG pitch was described as worn, adding pressure on both teams
Sri Lanka's spinners, particularly Maheekha Thikshana and Chamara Akakal, were highlighted as threats before the match
Post-Match Reflections: England players expressed relief and pride at advancing to the semi-finals
Sri Lanka's batting coach, Michael Bevan, acknowledged the challenging conditions but also the team's resilience
Gunathilaka's arrest became a significant post-match story, overshadowing the match result
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on November 05, 2022, at the Sydney Cricket Ground
The result marked England's eighth consecutive win against Sri Lanka in T20Is
Sri Lanka's chase down to the last over highlighted the intensity of the contest
Others: The match was part of Group 1 of the 2022 ICC Men's T20 World Cup
The arrest of Gunathilaka by Sydney police during the match was a notable incident
